EmailTemplate.name: Aerolase Lead First Activity
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Interest in Aerolase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
It's great to meet you
My name is {!Lead.OwnerFirstName}, and I'm the Aerolase representative that's been assigned to your organization. I would love to learn more about your interest in Aerolase.
Please feel free to reach out to me directly at: !Lead.OwnerPhone}.
Thanks!
{!Lead.OwnerFirstName}
Aerolase
"Improve Skin Concerns in a Whole New Way"
